description: A simple library containing all known terminal ansi escape codes and sequences.

name: ansi-escape-sequences

scripts.dist: rollup index.mjs -f umd -n ansi -o dist/index.js && rollup index.mjs -f esm -o dist/index.mjs
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -c jsdoc.conf -d 1 -t README.hbs index.mjs > README.md; echo
